entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegexKnownPatternTests.TerminationInNonBacktrackingVsBackTracking Failures on Linux ARM32 #62873
  • FileSystemWatcher on Linux uses an excessive amount of resources #62869
  • FileInfo's Attributes.HasFlag(FileAttributes.Normal) returns true for sockets #62868
  • AOT (mono-aot-cross) failure when building maccatalyst-arm64 submission test project #62865
  • CancellationToken ThrowIfCancellationRequested exceptions in documentation seems incorrect #62854
  • .NET 6 FileStream fails with System.IO.IOException: 'The parameter is incorrect' when FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING used #62851
  • Consider reducing HeaderDescriptor size by using object field #62847
    Future
  • Consider using SortedList instead of Dictionary in HttpHeaders #62846
    Future
  • Consider using pooled buffers for HttpClient response buffering #62845
    Future
  • Failure in test XML parsing #62844
  • [API Proposal]: AppendOnlyList #62841
  • .NET 6.0.101 breaks GENERIC_MATH_FEATURE/PreviewFeatures functionallity #62840
  • Add Repobeats Stats to README.md #62838
  • Analyzer warning about changing underlying array of ReadOnlyMemory struct #62835
  • [API Proposal]: Low-level runtime shutdown event for critical cleanup #62834
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Arm.Sha256 APIs are unavailable on Apple Silicon #62832
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops #62829
  • Test failure MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTest.Trim(throwOnDisposed: null) #62828
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Tests.EncryptingAndDecryptingAsymmetric.AsymmetricEncryptionRoundtripUseOAEP #62827
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.BreakpointInAssemblyUsingTypeFromAnotherAssembly_BothDynamicallyLoaded` timing out #62823

Closed

  • dotnet on linux does not use available TLS 1.2 cypher #62607
    7.0.0
  • Unable to uninstall .NET Core 3.1.20 Hosting Bundle. #62853
  • Documentation missing for CA1727 and CA1848 #62826
  • .NET 6 Console App Error on Simple Http Request - 10053 An established connection was aborted... #62825
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.ControlFlowBuilder.Reset`. #58765
    Future
  • ZLibStream does not seem to decompress correctly. #62858
  • Why Nullable<byte> is aligned to 8 bytes instead of 2 bytes as short does? #12977
    7.0.0
  • Struct promoted to auto-layout if it contains a non-blittable field type + explicit layout field type #44579
    Future
  • .NET 6 Android AOT fails on certain folder names #56163
    6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.GetSourceUsingSourceLink` failing #62551
  • Discussion: A way to prevent `Process` from configuring the terminal #62707
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentDictionary.TrimExcess #59324
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move 1604 docker based helix queues to 1804 #62871
    area-Infrastructure
  • WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #62870
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage tests #62867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow empty IGs when allocating unwind info for a fragment #62862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete several duplicate test projects under JIT/Methodical #62861
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Performance optimization of FileSystem.CreateDirectory on windows #62860
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Include Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref pack as part of 6.0.2 release #62859
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Run getter using Runtime.GetProperties #62857
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove the varargs-based mdarray helper. #62855
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • [wasm] disable flaky http test on wasm #62852
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #62850
  • [release/6.0-maui] [MonoAOTCompiler] more properties & custom WorkingDirectory #62849
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core file version #62848
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Main loongarch64 #62843
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add docs around NativeAOT workflows #62837
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable NativeAOT in the CI #62833
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • OSR support for Arm64 #62831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fixing regression for AuthType.Anonymous which leads to a NullReferenceException be thrown. #62824
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices

Merged

  • Making user secrets optional by default #62821
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Unify the FlushProcessWriteBuffers mechanism for macOS arm64 / x64 #62822
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add ubuntu 21.10 to CI matrix #62783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ConstantExpectedAttribute #62436
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make `ControlFlowBuilder.Clear` public. #62811
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Manifest DllImportSourceGenerator as a generator #62836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Protecting send message to debugger if it's disabled #62210
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Updated tracking issue #62814
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use wildcards for NativeAOT libs #62820
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62543
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #62283
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #62286
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Caching, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Fix re-initialization of hash objects on CNG. #62403
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #62789
  • Pass HFA/HVA in registers #62623
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [6.0] Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61931
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Port #58410: Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #62207
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Don't run the JIT formatting job in CI #61485
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make emitAddrMode xarch only #62830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Use 1ES pool instead of deprecated windows image in "Publish to Build Asset Registry" job #62839
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix method HttpHeadersNonValidated uses to get HeaderDescriptor #62194
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #62155
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #62124
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP] Scavenge fix #62008
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #62002
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Environment variable should override property for gcServer. #61969
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Disable poisoning for large structs #61601
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Backport all CI matrix changes from 7.0 to reelase/6.0 #62538
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [MonoAOTCompiler] more properties & custom WorkingDirectory #62725
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix source-link test #62786
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Fix types for arguments to printf calls #62796
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use 1ES pool instead of deprecated windows image in "Publish to Build Asset Registry" job #62797
    area-Infrastructure
  • IL cleanup - remove .module and make .assembly match source name #62812
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add custom marshaller tests for delegates #62691
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Improve ARM64 JIT disassembly #62557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring over NativeAOT smoke tests #62763
  • [Infra] Revert removal of clr dependency from mono builds #62788
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add SchemeHttp index to QPACK constants #62800
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62819
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62348
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1515632 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • CI matrix: Add windows 20H2 - fix TLS1.3 issue #62435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1. #62548
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Do not promote struct locals with holes #62738
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values #62798
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Backport build improvements, and fixes from #61581 #62757
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62236
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [6.0] Fix named mutexes on OSX to work between arm64 and emulated x64 processes #62765
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62769
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • Disable some suspicious tests which might lead to OOM crashes on Android emulators and arm64 devices #62767
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Testing with NodeJs on CI #62779
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][release/6.0] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62705
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Add support for running debugger tests CI #62431
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62716
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add runtime-community.yml pipeline and add s390x job #62808
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload strange behavior #23075
  • A part of lambda improvements feature doesn't work with latest SDK 6.0.101 #23074
  • Code using INumber<T> and preview features does not compile with .NET 6.0.101 SDK #23073
  • Crossgen2 attempting to generate PDB on Linux #23072

PullRequests

Created

  • Files not ending in css are probably not css files #23086
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1515089 #23084
    Area-Infrastructure
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080

Merged

  • Update to use new Razor transport packages #22902
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #23058
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge 6.0.2xx to main #22966

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Open questions for diagnostics for parameterless struct constructors #5546
  • [Open Question]: `required` parsing #5439

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • Champion "Extension function members" #192
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Enhanced switch statements #3038
    Working Set
  • Champion "params Span<T>" #1757
    Working Set
  • generic constraint: where T : ref struct #1148
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Added notes about interpolated strings in nullable flow analysis #5550

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE raw string literal feature list #58356
  • reference a sourcegenerator and use razor pages in same project ... Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp version error #58354
  • Option Strict - Object Initialization can be simplified #58352
  • IDE0005 fix-all-in-solution erroneously removes imports from NuGets referenced via PackageReference in .NET Framework projects #58348
  • Implicit conversion from type annotated with InterpolatedStringHandler crashes compiler #58346
  • VB: add support for subclassing C# record class #58342
  • Allow completion to add a global using rather than a file scoped using #58341
  • IVsLanguageDebugInfo.GetProximityExpressions does not work for top-level code #58337
    Backlog
  • Additional PROTOTYPE comments for param-nullchecking #58335

Closed

  • Proper nullable support for interpolated string handler constructors and conversions #54583
    17.1
  • Provide access to semantic model during filtering phase of incremental source generator #58112
    17.2
  • Project items added via VS API are writing resulting formatted doc in wrong place #58311
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to a prepared statement to avoid unintentional sql injection. #58359
    Area-IDE
  • Do not throw for user paths that contain a quote character in them. #58357
    Area-IDE
  • OmniSharp options - take 2 #58355
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Update hosted VS 2017 usage to 2019 #58353
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add update project version fixer for 'newlines in interpolations' #58350
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Null annotate ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #58340
    Area-Compilers
  • Report error if 'record struct' constructor calls default parameterless constructor #58339
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58347
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Swithc to acquiring the component model on a BG thread. #58351
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support CodeClass2.Parts returning parts in source generated files #58241
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Record list-patterns and newlines in interpolations as done #58250
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix failure to propagate cancellation token #58349
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58343
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge param-nullchecking to main #58338
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58333
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58334
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve usability of "enable nullable reference types" refactoring #58316
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change PROTOTYPE to issue reference #58336
    Area-Compilers
  • Resolve PROTOTYPE comments in param null checking #58324
    Area-Compilers
  • Address various minor param-nullchecking issues #58321
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58362
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58361
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58360
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Add semantic token caching for solution open #58238
    Area-IDE
  • SourceLink quality of life improvements #58209
    Area-IDE
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Extract Method: top level method that is static should create a static extraction #58021
    Area-IDE
  • for pr validation #57879
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter uses incorrect ModelStateDictionary keys for members containing single quotes #39069
  • Razor views generated during a BeforeBuild target are not compiled into the assembly #39068
  • FocusOnNavigate Component does not work for routes with different parameter values #39067
  • ASP.NET web core API - incorrect default xml serialization in Swagger #39064
  • Model validation with Minimal API #39063
  • Static file change during build causes browser refresh failure #39062
  • Can't configure windows authentication on the new angular SpaProxy #39061
  • Adding a space to an ASP.Core Hosted, WASM Blazor application breaks build. #39059
  • Blazor WebbAssembly exception when calling javascript function? #39056
  • RenderTreeDiffBuilder – components after components with @key are often recreated #39053
  • dotnet.wasm and other dll regenerated at each publish #39052
  • Perf regression: fortunes #39051
  • Identity Specification Tests Issues #39050

Closed

  • Make default app discriminator the same as it was in .net 5 so decryption works when upgrade to .net 6 #39070
  • Use string interpolation in .NET 6 minimal API routes #39054
  • Test bug report using issue template #39066
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #38921
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, endpoint #38975
  • Framework is calling getter of readonly property of [BindProperty] object before calling OnPost() #37596
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: mapaction #38983
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #39033
  • Access to the IDatabase field in RedisCache #38993
  • [Perf] Plaintext regression compared to 6.0 #38848
  • Change Current Value in InputBase<TValue> to Virtual? #20761
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation 3.1.22 has broken dependencies on NuGet #39020
  • TryUpdateModelAsync validates deep objects in excluded properties #25516
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop enforcing JSON read till end if `EndInvokeJS` returns early #39060
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Use correct path for NewtonsoftJson ModelState errors #39058
    area-mvc
  • [release/5.0] Move to OSX.1100.Amd64.Open #39049
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Bump site extension versions #39048
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport Use CDN for .NET Assets to release 6.0 #39043
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bump up download file timeout #39041
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Use GitHub Issue Form for Bug Report Template #39057
    7.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #39024
    6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] Bump up download file timeout #39042
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.14
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #39025
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.14
  • [release/3.1] Bump up download file timeout #39047
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.23
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #39026
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.23
  • [release/3.1] Remove Helix remnants #39004
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.23
  • Update xml-doc comment for `IEndpointRouteBuilder.ServiceProvider` #39055
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Use full suffixed version for DepProviderKey in installers #39035
    tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [WIP] ANCM on ARM64 #38997
  • Reimplement the concurrency limiter middleware to use the new abstractions & implementations #39040
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Blazor RemoteJSRuntime Use SignalR Hub Options before Global Options #38947
    area-blazor
  • Revert .NET SDK test bump, again #38937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RTL flow direction not working properly in stack layout #3779
  • Archiving .NET MAUI iOS apps not working #3777
  • Add ErrorText and HelpText property in all form controls #3776
  • Stepper doesn't fire ValueChanged event #3774
  • CollectionView Drag & Drop Item Reordering Spec #3767
  • When can we expect documentation on distribution to Appstore and google Playstore ? #3766

Closed

  • BlazorWebView for WPF not debuggable when blazor code is in a different project #1349
  • Using INotify interface in single modal for Blazor and Maui #1536
  • RCL css bundle 404 not found #3578
  • Blazor with WPF and WebView2: Scoped CSS files not found #3751

PullRequests

Created

  • Radiobutton Handler #3784
  • [android] stop using Build.VERSION.SdkInt #3783
  • Flyout apis android #3782
  • Remove no longer used LaunchScreen.xib files from templates #3780
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • [Housekeeping] Updated the Stepper sample in the Gallery #3775
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Execute Screenshot tests on the main thread #3752
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Updated SearchBarHandler native events #3728
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Changes to improve Border control drawing performance #3620
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible breaking change from 5.0.12 to 6.0.1 when using ExecutionStrategy property on RelationalDbContextOptionsBuilder #27018
  • EFCore 6 - Model is not getting validated when multiple columns have ValueGeneratedOnAdd() #27016
  • Hello all #27014
  • SqlServer: Translate string.IsNullOrEmpty with LIKE for column type char #27013

Closed

  • Migrations : dropping a column leaves the snapshot out of sync - is it ok to manually modify snapshots? #27017

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27020

    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0.2] Handle duplicate property infos when sorting columns. #26958
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0.2] Detach join entity when removing added relationship #26892
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0.2] Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are generated #26617
    Servicing-approved

    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27015

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why hasn't the 7.0.x Runtime installer been updated almost a month? #12850
  • Installer branch release/3.1.4xx not updated for 3.1.22? #12847

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update asp.net template version #12762
  • Update build logic to handle checked in project.assets.json in NuGet repo #12810
  • Clean prebuilt baseline #12816

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12839
